00023 #ifndef __MLPACK_CORE_OPTIMIZER_SA_LAPLACE_DISTRIBUTION_HPP
00024 #define __MLPACK_CORE_OPTIMIZER_SA_LAPLACE_DISTRIBUTION_HPP
00025 
00026 namespace mlpack {
00027 namespace distribution {
00028 
00059 class LaplaceDistribution
00060 {
00061  public:
00066   LaplaceDistribution() : scale(0) { }
00067 
00075   LaplaceDistribution(const size_t dimensionality, const double scale) :
00076       mean(arma::zeros<arma::vec>(dimensionality)), scale(scale) { }
00077 
00084   LaplaceDistribution(const arma::vec& mean, const double scale) :
00085       mean(mean), scale(scale) { }
00086 
00088   size_t Dimensionality() const { return mean.n_elem; }
00089 
00093   double Probability(const arma::vec& observation) const;
00094 
00101   arma::vec Random() const
00102   {
00103     arma::vec result(mean.n_elem);
00104     result.randu();
00105 
00106     // Convert from uniform distribution to Laplace distribution.
00107     // arma::sign() does not exist in Armadillo < 3.920 so we have to do this
00108     // elementwise.
00109     for (size_t i = 0; i < result.n_elem; ++i)
00110     {
00111       if (result[i] < 0)
00112         result[i] = mean[i] + scale * result[i] * std::log(1 + 2.0 * (result[i]
00113             - 0.5));
00114       else
00115         result[i] = mean[i] - scale * result[i] * std::log(1 - 2.0 * (result[i]
00116             - 0.5));
00117     }
00118 
00119     return result;
00120   }
00121 
00127   void Estimate(const arma::mat& observations);
00128 
00134   void Estimate(const arma::mat& observations,
00135                 const arma::vec& probabilities);
00136 
00138   const arma::vec& Mean() const { return mean; }
00140   arma::vec& Mean() { return mean; }
00141 
00143   double Scale() const { return scale; }
00145   double& Scale() { return scale; }
00146 
00148   std::string ToString() const;
00149 
00150  private:
00152   arma::vec mean;
00154   double scale;
00155 
00156 };
00157 
00158 }; // namespace distribution
00159 }; // namespace mlpack
00160 
00161 #endif
